hand-coordsystem.EMGCoordinateSystemDescription: x: Radial Styloid Process (RSP) → Ulnar Styloid Process (USP); y: Dorsal → Palmar surface at the midpoint RSP-USP; z: Third Metacarpophalangeal Joint (MCP) → midpoint RSP-USP

lower-leg-coordsystem.EMGCoordinateSystemDescription: x: Lateral Malleolus (LM) → Medial Malleolus (MM); y: Popliteal Fossa → Patellar Anterior Surface; z: midpoint MM-LM → Patellar Anterior Surface
